questions.question: Considering the overall packaging design, what is the dominant color scheme employed, encompassing both the background and label?

Based on the text on the package, what is the intended use for this product, targeting a specific demographic?
Describe the texture of the outer packaging material, considering its flexibility and appearance?
Focusing on the label, what additional attribute is mentioned regarding the product's scent?
What is the predominant shape of the package itself?
What is the packaging material primarily composed of, considering its flexibility and appearance?
What descriptive words are prominently repeated across the surface of the product's packaging?
What is the primary color of the words printed across the surface of the packaging?
What shape is the central label on the packaging?
What is the material of the central label on the package?
What is the overall design style of the packaging, considering the fonts, colors, and words used?
What is the general background pattern on the packaging material?
What is the primary color of the label that indicates the product's scent?
Describe the overall pattern on the packaging, paying attention to size and style of elements.
